title: About
text: Hello, my name is Gaurinath Subash and I am currently going into senior year.

title: MLS Soccer
text: Player salaries are drastically different based on player positions in the MLS soccer league. This was sourced from a data set which used data originally from the MLS Union. Mapping data was then used to visualize the player salaries by field position in an intuitive format. Offensive player positions such as Midfield and Forwards on average earn more than defensive positions such as goalkeeper and defenders in the MLS league in 2007.

title: MLS Soccer
text:
Soccer Postitions

Goalkeeper/GK
There is always 1 Goalkeeper in ANY formation


Defense/D
There are 4 defenders in this formation: Left Defender, Center Left Defender, Center Right Defender, and Right Defender.


Midfield/M
There are 3 midfielders in this formation: Left Midfielder, Center Midfielder, and Right Midfielder.


Forward/F
There are 3 Forwards in this formation: Left Forward, Center Forward, and Right Forward.

title: Defense
text:
Plot for all defenders in MLS League in 2007





This data shows the spread of salaries for defenders in 2007. The colors show the clubs each player was in, and the spread is wider than some might think. The highest salary for a defender during this time was almost $300,000.


Plot for average defender salary in 2007





This data shows a graph for the average salary a defender had in 2007. This was approximately $65,000, which is less than average for offensive positions.

title: Models
text:
\[y_i = \beta_0  + \beta_1 x_{1,i} + \epsilon_i\]
with \(y = base\_salary\), \(x_1 = position\), and \(\epsilon_i \sim N(0, \sigma^2)\).





stan_glm
 family:       gaussian [identity]
 formula:      base_salary ~ position
 observations: 371
 predictors:   10
------
            Median   MAD_SD  
(Intercept)  67045.9  33514.7
positionD-F -33576.6 330082.0
positionD-M  19919.9 153397.1
positionF    80224.1  50788.6
positionF-D -61899.8 334690.9
positionF-M -28653.4 175422.8
positionGK  -12165.2  62077.7
positionM    60647.6  44337.2
positionM-D  30166.2 140825.2
positionM-F   6753.5 109906.2

Auxiliary parameter(s):
      Median   MAD_SD  
sigma 336262.3  12440.8

------
* For help interpreting the printed output see ?print.stanreg
* For info on the priors used see ?prior_summary.stanreg

title: Sources
text:
I used kaggle for my dataset.

https://www.kaggle.com/code/kyleahfrederic/visualization-mls-base-salary-per-position-2007



I used certain portions of the data to make my own tibble, such as club, base_salary, and position. I cleaned the data by removing certain columns such as first_name and last_name.

title: Sources
text:
I used kaggle for my dataset.

https://www.kaggle.com/code/kyleahfrederic/visualization-mls-base-salary-per-position-2007



I used certain portions of the data to make my own tibble, such as club, base_salary, and position. I cleaned the data by removing certain columns such as first_name and last_name.

title: Offense
text:
Plot for all forwards in MLS League in 2007





This data shows the spread of salaries for defenders in 2007. The colors show the clubs each player was in, and the highest player salary was around 2.5 million dollars.


Plot for average forward salary in 2007





This data shows a graph for the average salary a forward had in 2007. This was approximately $150,000, which is more than average for defensive positions.

title: Goalkeepers
text:
Plot for all goalkeepers in MLS League in 2007





This data shows the spread of salaries for goalkeepers in 2007. The colors show the clubs each player was in, and the highest player salary was around $250,000 dollars.


Plot for average goalkeepers salary in 2007





This data shows a graph for the average salary a goalkeeper had in 2007. This was approximately $50,000, which is less than average for offensive positions.

title: Midfield
text:
Plot for all midfelders in MLS League in 2007





This data shows the spread of salaries for midfielders in 2007. The colors show the clubs each player was in, and the highest player salary was around 5 million dollars.


Plot for average midfielder salary in 2007





This data shows a graph for the average salary a midfielder had in 2007. This was approximately $140,000, which is more than average for defensive positions.
